name: Efir Traces
text:
Choose two. If this spell was copied, you may choose three instead —

• Draw two cards, then discard a card.

•  You gain 3 life.

•  Meditate (Put an orb counter on a Chi you control. If you don’t control one, first create a Chi enchantment token with "{1}, Sacrifice this: Copy target spell you control with mana value equal or less to the number of Orb counters on this. You may choose new targets for the copy.")
